name: Grave Cave
description:
Avoid the spooky red ghosts as you travel down a cave.

THIS GAME IS INCOMPLETE. LESS THAN 3 HOURS WAS SPENT ON IT, BUT THIS WILL BE SORTED IN THE NEXT 24 HOURS. POSTPONE RATING FOR WHEN THIS MESSAGE IS GONE.

Travelling down a procedurally generated cave, you as a lost miner must run and double-jump your way through, avoiding the ghosts, to the green end.

CONTROLS

  • A + D or Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Space or W - Jump

Grave Cave was made in < 3 hours for the TriJam game jam #60.
Theme: "When the lights turn off." <- bad theme
This game does not fit the theme.
Any feedback is appreciated in the comments.
Thanks for playing!
